Strings.Text: {scroll 0}I'm Chris, of Alpha Team,\nI've come to rescue you.{scroll 1}{clear 120}{scroll 0}\nRichard, what happened?{scroll 1}{timed 73}
{scroll 0}Chris, this house is\ntoo dangerous,{scroll 1}{clear 123}{scroll 0}there are terrible demons,\nouch!{scroll 1}{timed 107}
{scroll 0}He seems to have been bitten\nby a poisonous snake,{scroll 1}{clear 90}{scroll 0}but the size of the wound\nis abnormally large.{scroll 1}{timed 94}
{scroll 0}It's not just a poisonous\nsnake, it's a monster!{scroll 1}{timed 151}
{scroll 0}Richard! He needs serum, but\nwe left it in another room.{scroll 1}{timed 138}
{scroll 0}I will. Wait here,\nI'll be back soon.{scroll 1}{timed 109}
{scroll 0}Richard, hold on I'll give\nyou a shot now.{scroll 1}{timed 110}
{scroll 0}\nRichard... Richard, are you?{scroll 1}{clear 92}{scroll 0}Rebecca, it's very dangerous out\nhere. Will you come with me?{scroll 1}{timed 163}
{scroll 0}I-I'd like to stay here\na little bit longer.{scroll 1}{timed 106}
{scroll 0}Okay, Rebecca.\nCan you use a gun?{scroll 1}{clear 93}{scroll 0}I'll look for the others,\nprotect yourself.{timed 110}
{scroll 2}I've got to go to get the\nserum...{scroll 10}
{scroll 2}His breathing has stopped. \nTry mouth to mouth?{branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}His breathing has completely\nstopped.{clear 0}{scroll 2}He will die if he doesn't\nget some oxygen soon.
